I'm not sure if we should have a reference in every exception to the CircuitBreaker instance.
I would prefer if we just add the name to the CallNotPermittedException as a field.
I also felt a bit uncomfortable doing this, but also didn't want future requests asking to add other fields in the exception. What's the major concern with adding a reference?
Any update? Can change to just having string if there are major concerns.
Yes, please change it to a string.
